body_html:
FYI, it works for me with CUDA 9.0 and tensorflow 1.8.0, when I install tensorflow and tensorflow-gpu separately:

pip uninstall tensorflow
pip uninstall tensorflow-gpu
pip install tensorflow==1.8.0
pip install tensorflow-gpu==1.8.0
body_text:
FYI, it works for me with CUDA 9.0 and tensorflow 1.8.0, when I install tensorflow and tensorflow-gpu separately:
pip uninstall tensorflow
pip uninstall tensorflow-gpu
pip install tensorflow==1.8.0
pip install tensorflow-gpu==1.8.0
body:
FYI, it works for me with CUDA 9.0 and tensorflow 1.8.0, when I install `tensorflow` and `tensorflow-gpu` separately:
```
pip uninstall tensorflow
pip uninstall tensorflow-gpu
pip install tensorflow==1.8.0
pip install tensorflow-gpu==1.8.0
```
